description: Live on a twitch stream and something goes wrong
Doing a live talk and the building gets struck by lightning
Pair programming but they get distracted by something scary
Virtual reality gaming session, and the power goes out
Coding during a hackathon, and the fire alarm goes off
Podcasting live, and a surprise guest joins unexpectedly
Art livestream, and the artist spills coffee on their masterpiece
Online yoga class, and the instructor's cat interrupts the session
